trends: There have been no other sightings in New Milford
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was sleeping in an upstairs bedroom. it was early summer, and the window was open. i was awakened by an awareness. i looked out the window and saw a large roundish disc hovering aboue the trees. the leaves were not moving, there was no heat, and almost no sound. the sound i heard was a humming\whir that repeated. the disc had lights that outlined the perimeter of the disc. the lights glowed white-blue and they pulsed in a circular motion, and with each pulse there was a hum and the lights would brighten. it was like a brightness that was sent around the underside of the disc in a circle. there were individual window\rectangle\sections that would be brighter as the light went around. i realized that this was a ufo. i watched it, and observed its unique qualities, i sat up and looked away to turn on the light to let everyone come see it. i looked back and it was gone, no sight no sound just gone.
Summary: i was awakened by something, it was early summer. just before dawn. i saw a large hovering disc with pulsating glowing lights. the trees were not moving and there was no heat . there was a humming that followed the pattern of the lights.
